<script>
(function(){
  var tx = '{{DL - Transaction ID}}';
  if (!tx) return;
  var key = 'p_tx_' + tx;
  if (localStorage.getItem(key)) {
    window.dataLayer.push({event:'purchase_blocked_duplicate', tx: tx});
  } else {
    localStorage.setItem(key, '1');
  }
})();
</script>

<script>
(function () {
  'use strict';

  // --- Helpers (ES5-safe: only var + function expressions) ---
  var getCookie = function(name) {
    var m = document.cookie.match(new RegExp('(?:^|; )' + name.replace(/[-[\]\/{}()*+?.\\^$|]/g, '\\$&') + '=([^;]*)'));
    return m ? decodeURIComponent(m[1]) : null;
  };

  var getBaseDomain = function() {
    var host = location.hostname;
    if (!host || host === 'localhost') return null;
    var parts = host.split('.');
    // Try higher-level domains until one accepts a test cookie
    for (var i = parts.length - 2; i >= 0; i--) {
      var candidate = '.' + parts.slice(i).join('.');
      try {
        document.cookie = 'gtm_test_domain=1; path=/; domain=' + candidate;
        var ok = document.cookie.indexOf('gtm_test_domain=1') !== -1;
        // cleanup
        document.cookie = 'gtm_test_domain=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT; path=/; domain=' + candidate;
        if (ok) return candidate;
      } catch (e) {}
    }
    return null;
  };

  var setCookie = function(name, value, days) {
    var d = new Date();
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (days * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
    var cookie = name + '=' + encodeURIComponent(value) +
      '; expires=' + d.toUTCString() +
      '; path=/';
    var domain = getBaseDomain();
    if (domain) cookie += '; domain=' + domain;
    document.cookie = cookie;
  };

  var parseQuery = function(qs) {
    var out = {};
    if (!qs) return out;
    var s = qs.charAt(0) === '?' ? qs.slice(1) : qs;
    if (!s) return out;
    var parts = s.split('&');
    for (var i = 0; i < parts.length; i++) {
      var kv = parts[i].split('=');
      if (!kv[0]) continue;
      var k = decodeURIComponent(kv[0]);
      var v = decodeURIComponent(kv[1] || '');
      out[k] = v;
    }
    return out;
  };

  // --- Read inputs ---
  var src = '(direct)';
  var camp = '(none)';
  var landing = location.pathname; // avoid query to reduce PII risk

  try {
    if (typeof URLSearchParams !== 'undefined') {
      var params = new URLSearchParams(location.search || '');
      var s = params.get('utm_source');
      var c = params.get('utm_campaign');
      if (s) src = s;
      if (c) camp = c;
    } else {
      var q = parseQuery(location.search || '');
      if (q.utm_source) src = q.utm_source;
      if (q.utm_campaign) camp = q.utm_campaign;
    }
  } catch (e) {
    // Fallback parser on any error
    var q2 = parseQuery(location.search || '');
    if (q2.utm_source) src = q2.utm_source;
    if (q2.utm_campaign) camp = q2.utm_campaign;
  }

  // --- First-touch only (cookies) ---
  if (!getCookie('first_utm_source')) setCookie('first_utm_source', src, 180);
  if (!getCookie('first_utm_campaign')) setCookie('first_utm_campaign', camp, 180);
  if (!getCookie('first_landing_page')) setCookie('first_landing_page', landing, 180);

  // --- LocalStorage fallback (if cookies blocked) ---
  try {
    if (!localStorage.getItem('first_utm_source')) localStorage.setItem('first_utm_source', src);
    if (!localStorage.getItem('first_utm_campaign')) localStorage.setItem('first_utm_campaign', camp);
    if (!localStorage.getItem('first_landing_page')) localStorage.setItem('first_landing_page', landing);
  } catch (e) {}
})();
</script>
